businessProfile.name: Ferro Pizza

reviews.text:
Food was cooked properly but needed to be sea better. The entree was Chicken Parmigiana which came with soup and salad. Portion side was very good. It’s just bland. Perhaps it’s done this way purposely due to the customer base being on the older side?

Service was friendly and attentive.
Atmosphere is classic 90’s pizzeria restaurant. Clean but old school.

Awesome spot for Italian food. The place has a cozy vibe, and the staff were super friendly and helpful. We had pasta and pizza, and both were fresh and delicious. You can tell they use good ingredients and really care about what they serve. All the appetizers were also amazing. Overall a 10/10
experience would go 1000 times again.

Fast service, hard to decide what to get from the menu since one dish is better than the other, so we ended up getting the fixed-price menu (you can get it until 7pm), which includes a glass of wine, soup, salad, garlic buns, one entrée and spumoni ice cream ALL THESE in one price! Needless to say that we never finished our entrée because of all the stuff we ate before that. Been there many times before, been there last week and will definitely going back again soon.

Ferro has terrific NY style pizza with authentic toppings. The spaghetti was ok. Marinara very watery.  I was a bit surprised they'd serve something that was so watery.  A little upgrade in the decor and better attention to the marinara and perhaps some real grated parmesian would  add a star to the food rating.

Terrible service do not place an order online with them. The system
Messes up your order and send it out incorrectly the staff is rude and unwilling to fix the issues that the system creates. And I’m a customer that always orders here needless to say I will not be anymore. I paid for sausage on one side and they added it to both and states that I’m still wrong the broccoli paid for one and added it to both and the onion

editorial_summary.overview: This low-key Italian joint offers made-to-order pizzas, subs & pastas in a casual setting.

recentReviews.text: The most courteous, attentive & prompt service to my take out order at this restaurant. Will be back!
Dining at Ferro’s is always a pleasure. Can’t go wrong here.
Im so used to NY pizza that's why I gave the food only 4 stars. It's pretty good for Florida pizza tho.
Excellent food!!!!  Great service!!!!  Once you try Ferro's, you will be back!!!!

I’ve been a loyal customer of this restaurant for a long time, but after my experience last night, I don’t see myself returning. I ordered two large pizzas and one medium, but when I arrived to pick up my order, I was handed one large and two medium pizzas. When I questioned it, the girl at the counter went to speak with the pizza guy, and instead of making it right, they simply took one of the medium pizzas out of their box and put it into a large box.  I was told the pizzas were just “in the wrong size boxes,” but when I got home and opened them, it was obvious — I had three medium pizzas, even though I paid $70 for two large and one medium.

To make matters worse, all three pizzas were undercooked. This isn’t the first time I’ve ordered from here, and I used to really like this place, but the combination of DISHONESTY and poor quality was incredibly disappointing. Sadly, I can’t see myself coming back

detailedReviews.author: Dylan J
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in broward

detailedReviews.author: Iris Long
detailedReviews.text: The most courteous, attentive & prompt service to my take out order at this restaurant. Will be back!

detailedReviews.author: Marsha Weinstein
detailedReviews.text: Dining at Ferro’s is always a pleasure. Can’t go wrong here.

detailedReviews.author: Glenn Soffin
detailedReviews.text: Perfect

detailedReviews.author: K D Pauly-Gugliuzza
detailedReviews.text: Im so used to NY pizza that's why I gave the food only 4 stars. It's pretty good for Florida pizza tho.

detailedReviews.author: Diane Lakosky
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food!!!!  Great service!!!!  Once you try Ferro's, you will be back!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Tracy Beck
detailedReviews.text:
I’ve been a loyal customer of this restaurant for a long time, but after my experience last night, I don’t see myself returning. I ordered two large pizzas and one medium, but when I arrived to pick up my order, I was handed one large and two medium pizzas. When I questioned it, the girl at the counter went to speak with the pizza guy, and instead of making it right, they simply took one of the medium pizzas out of their box and put it into a large box.  I was told the pizzas were just “in the wrong size boxes,” but when I got home and opened them, it was obvious — I had three medium pizzas, even though I paid $70 for two large and one medium.

To make matters worse, all three pizzas were undercooked. This isn’t the first time I’ve ordered from here, and I used to really like this place, but the combination of DISHONESTY and poor quality was incredibly disappointing. Sadly, I can’t see myself coming back

detailedReviews.author: Christos Theocharous
detailedReviews.text: Fast service, hard to decide what to get from the menu since one dish is better than the other, so we ended up getting the fixed-price menu (you can get it until 7pm), which includes a glass of wine, soup, salad, garlic buns, one entrée and spumoni ice cream ALL THESE in one price! Needless to say that we never finished our entrée because of all the stuff we ate before that. Been there many times before, been there last week and will definitely going back again soon.

detailedReviews.author: miguel cardoso
detailedReviews.text: They got the best pizza in town

detailedReviews.author: Lianna Carmona
detailedReviews.text: We tried this place for the first time today and ordered takeout 4 meals totaling almost $90. Unfortunately, the food was very disappointing. Everything tasted bland and watered down, with little to no seasoning. The Alfredo sauce didn’t taste like Alfredo at all, and the Chicken Francese lacked any lemon flavor. The spaghetti with marinara was also flavorless, the garlic bread was stale and dry, and even the soups had no taste. Sadly, we wouldn’t return for a second visit.

detailedReviews.author: Laura Kessler
detailedReviews.text: Great food at great prices

detailedReviews.author: paul dipaola
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is very good. Food is good. Service is excellent. The atmosphere reminds me of an old school NY pizzeria. Brings back a lot of childhood memories.

detailedReviews.author: Marie Auguste
detailedReviews.text: It’s our local Italian restaurant. The food is very good. The service is very good and they got an excellent early bird special.

detailedReviews.author: Marybeth Snell
detailedReviews.text: Food is delicious and the young man at the register was so kind and helped me carry my order to the car.

detailedReviews.author: Alice Loring
detailedReviews.text: Great food

detailedReviews.author: Susan Bradley
detailedReviews.text: Can't say enough good things about Ferro's. Service fantastic. Food absolutely incredible! Been going here my whole life being born here. Even you haven't eaten their pizza then you need to!

detailedReviews.author: Hal Kreitman
detailedReviews.text: Excellent p8zza and Italian restaurant

detailedReviews.author: Smile Alot
detailedReviews.text: Hands down my favorite !!! Food hot and consistently great ingredients !!! Fast and easy I won free pizza loved it!!!

detailedReviews.author: Robert M
detailedReviews.text:
Delivery was right on time
Pizza was perfect

detailedReviews.author: luke scala
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is fantastic!! We had the thin crust and the Detroit style.

detailedReviews.author: MARIE LOSEY
detailedReviews.text: Ferros Pizza is awesome!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Miladys Perez
detailedReviews.text: I’m not sure if they had a bad day or the customers that put 5 stars are not being truthful but i spent 67 dollars (including tip because the waitress was nice and did her job) HOWEVER the food was not worth 67 dollars . i agree with some reviews thats the garlic rolls are oily and have no flavor which is a common theme in the rest of the food I ordered. My child LOVES pasta and she barely even touched it. The spagetti and SINGULAR giant meatball from the kids menu was trash. its like the chef had leftover cat paté, formed it into a giant meatball and served that on a platter. We also ordered a margarita pizza… when i tell you i have never had pizza that bad the mozzarella was flavorless, rubbery and not the way it should be and the sauce i swear had NO FLAVOR!! i took one bite and just gave up honestly the kind waitress asked if i needed a box i’ve never been so quick to say NO i literally left an entire pizza behind a complete waste of money AND food. and one last note the floor under my table was so oily you could tell it was not cleaned properly. i genuinely hope they take this as constructive criticism because olive garden should not be better than a authentic Italian restaurant

detailedReviews.author: Lucky Scoops
detailedReviews.text: Great tasting pizza

detailedReviews.author: Paul Kavanagh
detailedReviews.text: Love this joint 😋 can't beat the price fixed specials, soup, salad, garlic knots , nice selection of entres with pasta and coffee and spumoni dessert 😋 happy hour wine 🍷 prices, bottle of Chianti for $ 14. You can't beat it. Service was on spot with both Chase and Natalie awesome.

detailedReviews.author: Cara Sandler
detailedReviews.text:
This place has really gone downhill.  It used to be my absolute favorite but my past few orders have had issues.

I ordered chicken piccata, and the chicken itself was OK, but they gave me a side of pasta with marinara sauce on it. Why in the world would you not put the piccata sauce on the pasta as well?

My most recent order was baked ziti,  I requested extra sauce, and this definitely did not have extra sauce. The garlic rolls are completely dry. There’s absolutely no butter on them at all.

The girl working the counter was rude to the customer before me, and while not outright rude to me, was pretty unpleasant.

unfortunately, it seems that this restaurant no longer has the quality and service that they used to have, and I probably won’t be going back.

detailedReviews.author: Mike Hathcock
detailedReviews.text: Awful. Got sick.  Went with friends and we all got sick...ordered a pizza and it had a weird taste.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Carlton Orrizzi
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is great. The pasta dishes are absolutely disgusting

detailedReviews.author: Wendy Lettieri
detailedReviews.text: Authentic taste and experience.

detailedReviews.author: Sonya's Soul Link
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food!!!  I order here often and its always the freshest!!!

detailedReviews.author: Mark Cohen
detailedReviews.text: Been going there for 30 yrs and it was always good when ever we went and loved the ferros.

detailedReviews.author: Bridget
detailedReviews.text: Food is always delicious… Our server was fantastic…

detailedReviews.author: Andrea d
detailedReviews.text: Not the same . The pizza is smaller and  the flavor is not the same, my kids won’t eat it anymore

detailedReviews.author: Jeremy Smith
detailedReviews.text: Good place for a really good Italian food in Tamarac and all surrounding Area

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Innocenzi
detailedReviews.text: Nice place however the Italian sauce is bland

detailedReviews.author: Jaela Mansell
detailedReviews.text: The food and service was amazing!! Definitely coming back again!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Beth Jones
detailedReviews.text:
I have been to Ferros for years.
But the last couple of times, the pizza was just OK and overpriced.
Last night I ordered a large. It was over 22.00.
When she handed me the pizza, it was so light I held it by the side of the box with 1 hand. I get home open the box.
The sauce and cheese started 2 inches from the crust all the way around.. A medium pizza on a large doe. It was light sauce and light cheese. No substance.
The worst.  I wish I took a picture of it.
Ferros is gone way down hill.
Mr. And Mrs. Ferro ran a consistant abundant resturant.
I don't know who's running it now, but don't waste your money or time on Ferros. No Bueno.

detailedReviews.author: sara vega
detailedReviews.text:
Awesome spot for Italian food. The place has a cozy vibe, and the staff were super friendly and helpful. We had pasta and pizza, and both were fresh and delicious. You can tell they use good ingredients and really care about what they serve. All the appetizers were also amazing. Overall a 10/10
experience would go 1000 times again.

detailedReviews.author: Jim
detailedReviews.text: Our son moved in with his wife today and we got pizza for all of his friends. Thanks for another outstanding experience.

detailedReviews.author: Landin Trucking
detailedReviews.text: The food and Service was great !!

detailedReviews.author: Andrea Abud
detailedReviews.text: Everything was great! Love it ❤️

detailedReviews.author: LAURA SUAREZ
detailedReviews.text:
This is my Revised Review: Ferros Pizza did address the issue regarding the Sub Dressing. I still order there frequently, as they are very conveniently located to me, the subs are big and delicious, as well as their other menu items, and service and friendliness is always good.

Previous Review: Ordered a 12 inch sub, dressing on the side. It came with less than 1oz of oil/vinaigrette. I asked for another 1/2 filled 2oz souffle cup of oil/vinegar and they made me pay $1.49 cents on my credit card. I order from Ferros 2-3 times a week. They are located behind my house. HOWEVER!!! The nickel and diming that they have implemented recently is not good. I have been a regular customer for the past 9 years. I guess they do not know that it is more difficult to get a NEW Customer than to keep the ones that you already have.. Business 101. P.S. I do NOT enjoy writing any negative reviews at all. But I think this kind of thing needs to be brought to ownership's attention. I mean..... at least fill up a 2oz cup all the way. Why waste the plastic souffle cup by only filling it 1/2 way??

detailedReviews.author: Barry Smith
detailedReviews.text: We have been coming here for years and have never been disappointed. Food and service is good.

detailedReviews.author: Rosana Allen
detailedReviews.text: Thank you for taking our order at the last few minutes of the night. Emily is the best.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Okeefe
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful dinner experience!  Great food, superb service!! 😊

detailedReviews.author: Nohemy Lopez
detailedReviews.text: The food it's very good,  not salty just perfect,  staff very polite, nice atmosphere,  great to have a peaceful lunch or dinner. The amount of time between the order and service it's appropriate. I had order before from there and I have always like the food, very Italian. First time that I actually went to the restaurant and I like it very much. I really recommend this restaurant if you want to have a good Italian food.

detailedReviews.author: David Domke
detailedReviews.text: My family generally orders to be delivered. We have ordered dinners as well as pizzas. The dinners are delicious and generous portions. Curtis special pizza is to die for and well worth the price. Everyone we’ve dealt with are very friendly and professional. They have my vote!

detailedReviews.author: Dave Enlow
detailedReviews.text: Always great food and service at a good price.  Shop Local - they’re the best!

detailedReviews.author: L D
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was very good and my son says he loved the wings and can't wait until football season to eat the wings again

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Faria
detailedReviews.text:
Terrible service do not place an order online with them. The system
Messes up your order and send it out incorrectly the staff is rude and unwilling to fix the issues that the system creates. And I’m a customer that always orders here needless to say I will not be anymore. I paid for sausage on one side and they added it to both and states that I’m still wrong the broccoli paid for one and added it to both and the onion

detailedReviews.author: Jose Meneses
detailedReviews.text: I had a delightful experience at Ferro Restaurant. The Chicken Parmigiana, Zuppa di Pesce, and Garlic Rolls delicious.  The staff was cordial, and a pleasant ambiance. Highly recommend Ferro Restaurant.

detailedReviews.author: G LePage
detailedReviews.text: Quality of the food was excellent. It was ready when expected. Love their pizza!

detailedReviews.author: shantall ventura
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Tamarac at a good price and great service.

detailedReviews.author: Jordy
detailedReviews.text: It’s kinda sad how it’s gone down since changing ownership. It used to be pretty consistent, but now it’s it or miss with the food. The food doesn’t even look the same. It’s sloppy. The cheese tonight looks like an after thought (you can still see its square shape) as if it was rushed. Maybe it’s just me, but quality has kinda gone down while the prices have gone up.

detailedReviews.author: Mime Quinones
detailedReviews.text: Always our go to takeout pizza in the neighborhood. It’s always fresh, and stop on. Thanks for always feeding us!

detailedReviews.author: Mime Quinones
detailedReviews.text: Ferro hits the spot every time. We absolutely love the pizza. Thanks for feeding us! Delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Adriana Botero
detailedReviews.text: I like place always!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Visga
detailedReviews.text: We had Claudio gor our server. He was Amazing, He made us feel very welcome, had great conversation and catered to our every need. The food was great also! One of the best restaurant experiences Ive had in a long time!

detailedReviews.author: Gabriel Garcia
detailedReviews.text: Best Stromboli I had in a long time! The Italian wedding soup and fried calamari were perfect! Pizza 👍

detailedReviews.author: James Ramirez
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in the area! Great service and super helpful!

detailedReviews.author: Patricia diaz
detailedReviews.text: Very friendly staff. Nice music playing. Just a relaxing atmosphere just like home

detailedReviews.author: Rosalie Fortis
detailedReviews.text: The entire experience was great. Food was amazing, Server was also amazing.

detailedReviews.author: Barbara Kopcewich
detailedReviews.text:
We have had delivery from Ferro Pizza many
times and food is always delicious! Deliver is always punctual and people are always friendly and professional!

detailedReviews.author: dora clarke
detailedReviews.text: My husband and I love this pizza.  We always pickup to go.  He’s a big fan of their deep dish and I love the pepperoni pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Meg Thompson
detailedReviews.text: Best in Broward! Perfect NY style pizza. The sauce is extra and the crust is always the perfect thickness!

detailedReviews.author: Christian Lambertz
detailedReviews.text: We love everything we have tried from Ferro. We usually order at least once a week.

detailedReviews.author: Lynne Guzman.
detailedReviews.text: Went there to get pizza. It was very good from New York.

detailedReviews.author: Anthony L. Esposito
detailedReviews.text: Take out of slice of pizza which I so much appreciate.

detailedReviews.author: John Cue
detailedReviews.text:
Food was cooked properly but needed to be sea better. The entree was Chicken Parmigiana which came with soup and salad. Portion side was very good. It’s just bland. Perhaps it’s done this way purposely due to the customer base being on the older side?

Service was friendly and attentive.
Atmosphere is classic 90’s pizzeria restaurant. Clean but old school.

detailedReviews.author: Paige Klein
detailedReviews.text: I went today for a special request for my husband. He said it was OK, but not GREAT. Service was excellent and they got the order right and fast. Paid around $30 for 1 to-go meal (even though it incl a salad and garlic rolls, I thought it was a bit pricey). The atmosphere was cute, but tight if you are claustrophobic. Overall not bad in a pinch because they did provide my special request,  but it wasn't anything to write home about. Was recommended highly by a friend that goes often, so to each their own on taste. I had the garlic rolls though and they were great!

detailedReviews.author: Lenore Croce
detailedReviews.text: Ferro Pizza should be called "Delicious Ferro Food & Pizza" my family went there for my granddaughter's birthday and it was such a good experience because the food was absolutely delicious. We had their delicious garlic rolls, and they're fried calamari, and then we all have different dishes. First of all the service was fantastic. Before we could even ask for more water or could you get me this and that it was already sent to the table. My food was exceptional. I am Italian American I'm very fussy about going to eat Italian food. I ordered the seafood dish with Linguini and I cannot even tell you how this masterpiece came out and how delicious it was. First of all they give such amazing amount of food and the seafood was delicious the pasta was delicious and cooked perfect and I was so pleased I couldn't wait to tell the owner. I looked at all the dishes that came out for the family, and each one had such an amazing amount of food and was so put in the dishes so well and looks so appetizing, and everyone was satisfied with the food. Sometimes you go to a restaurant and when the dish comes out it looks like they shared it with somebody else because the prices are high and the amount in the dishes is very small. That does not happen in Ferro's. The seafood in my dish was so well cooked, not overcooked and delicious with the amount of seasoning.... just perfectly done. My daughter had the eggplant parmesan it was delicious and also an amazing amount done so perfectly and looked so delicious when it came out we all said "oh wow look at that" we have gone there for pizza and their Pizza is really good, and does not make you hesitate to call them for delivery or to go there and sit down and enjoy a delicious pizza. Now you see why I want to call it delicious because everything in there is really good. I am very "Picky," and cannot wait to go back again!Thank You Ferros for making my granddaughter's birthday dinner something special. I come from Miami Lakes area and don't mind doing the driving to come back there at all. Hope to see you really soon Tony... if I close my eyes and just eat there and feels like I'm eating in Brooklyn New York where I come from originally. Lenore Croce

detailedReviews.author: Lois Fields
detailedReviews.text: Have ordered Sicilian pizza from Ferro’s before and always been delicious however this time we ordered a Sicilian pie for my husband’s birthday and were very disappointed. The 4 slices in the middle were fine but the 4 corner slices had very little sauce and cheese. It was like eating very dry bread.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Oberman
detailedReviews.text: Huge portions...tasty food.

detailedReviews.author: Noemi Perez
detailedReviews.text: After being a Ferro’s customer , March 28th, 2025 was my last day ordering; we will  never come back again. My son asked me to order a medium cheese pizza and an order of fried calamari. I called, I placed the order. For my surprise the total  amount was  $39+ wow, thank goodness I didn’t add a topping of pepperoni as my son asked me to, knowing that I like it on my pizza. My son is leaving for the US Army and we just trying to enjoy every single moment we can before he leaves.  Ferro really surprised us. I understand inflation, but eating outside is an option .

detailedReviews.author: Itza D
detailedReviews.text: Delicious and great service!

detailedReviews.author: Al C (Al)
detailedReviews.text: Very good food and timely preparation.  We usually order takeout and there's never been a delay.  Get the pizza lightly baked, it's great.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.5/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the excellent and courteous service, which enhances their overall dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The fixed-price menu offers incredible value with a variety of items, including wine and dessert, making it a popular choice for diners. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The pizza is frequently described as the best in town, evoking nostalgia for classic NY pizzerias. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues due to poor food quality and service - review management can address this concern
Bland and inconsistent food quality leading to customer dissatisfaction - social media marketing can improve this area
Issues with online ordering system and rude customer service - Boostly marketing services can improve this

positive.author: Iris Long
positive.text: The most courteous, attentive & prompt service to my take out order at this restaurant. Will be back!

neutral.author: Cara Sandler
neutral.text:
This place has really gone downhill.  It used to be my absolute favorite but my past few orders have had issues.

I ordered chicken piccata, and the chicken itself was OK, but they gave me a side of pasta with marinara sauce on it. Why in the world would you not put the piccata sauce on the pasta as well?

My most recent order was baked ziti,  I requested extra sauce, and this definitely did not have extra sauce. The garlic rolls are completely dry. There’s absolutely no butter on them at all.

The girl working the counter was rude to the customer before me, and while not outright rude to me, was pretty unpleasant.

unfortunately, it seems that this restaurant no longer has the quality and service that they used to have, and I probably won’t be going back.

neutral.author: Brian Carlton Orrizzi
neutral.text: Pizza is great. The pasta dishes are absolutely disgusting

negative.author: Tracy Beck
negative.text:
I’ve been a loyal customer of this restaurant for a long time, but after my experience last night, I don’t see myself returning. I ordered two large pizzas and one medium, but when I arrived to pick up my order, I was handed one large and two medium pizzas. When I questioned it, the girl at the counter went to speak with the pizza guy, and instead of making it right, they simply took one of the medium pizzas out of their box and put it into a large box.  I was told the pizzas were just “in the wrong size boxes,” but when I got home and opened them, it was obvious — I had three medium pizzas, even though I paid $70 for two large and one medium.

To make matters worse, all three pizzas were undercooked. This isn’t the first time I’ve ordered from here, and I used to really like this place, but the combination of DISHONESTY and poor quality was incredibly disappointing. Sadly, I can’t see myself coming back

negative.author: Lianna Carmona
negative.text: We tried this place for the first time today and ordered takeout 4 meals totaling almost $90. Unfortunately, the food was very disappointing. Everything tasted bland and watered down, with little to no seasoning. The Alfredo sauce didn’t taste like Alfredo at all, and the Chicken Francese lacked any lemon flavor. The spaghetti with marinara was also flavorless, the garlic bread was stale and dry, and even the soups had no taste. Sadly, we wouldn’t return for a second visit.

negative.author: Miladys Perez
negative.text: I’m not sure if they had a bad day or the customers that put 5 stars are not being truthful but i spent 67 dollars (including tip because the waitress was nice and did her job) HOWEVER the food was not worth 67 dollars . i agree with some reviews thats the garlic rolls are oily and have no flavor which is a common theme in the rest of the food I ordered. My child LOVES pasta and she barely even touched it. The spagetti and SINGULAR giant meatball from the kids menu was trash. its like the chef had leftover cat paté, formed it into a giant meatball and served that on a platter. We also ordered a margarita pizza… when i tell you i have never had pizza that bad the mozzarella was flavorless, rubbery and not the way it should be and the sauce i swear had NO FLAVOR!! i took one bite and just gave up honestly the kind waitress asked if i needed a box i’ve never been so quick to say NO i literally left an entire pizza behind a complete waste of money AND food. and one last note the floor under my table was so oily you could tell it was not cleaned properly. i genuinely hope they take this as constructive criticism because olive garden should not be better than a authentic Italian restaurant

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
